SpinCore PulseBlaster Interpreter Change Log

20120404
	-Added 64bit support

20070420
	-Compatibility with SpinAPI version 20070420

20070411
	- 'About' Descriptor string modified

20061009
	- update: compatibility with spinapi version 20061009.

20060706
	- update: compatibility with spinapi version 20060706.

20060517
	- Changed Parse Values to only show when Show Debug Information is selected.
	- Fixed error in which temporary files were not being deleted.
	- Added support for variables.

20060516
	- Added Natural Language.
